item.title: Peace Is Unraveling
item.description: As states disregard limits on the lawful use of force, this may be just the beginning of a slide into frequent war.

item.title: Swiss Bar Hit by Deadly Fire Was Not Inspected for Five Years, Authorities Say
item.description: Officials in Crans-Montana, the Swiss alpine resort town where a bar fire killed 40 people last week, are facing growing accusations of lax oversight.

item.title: Tim Walz’s 17 Months in Politics Before Ending His Re-election Bid
item.description: Mr. Walz drew national notice when Kamala Harris chose him as her running mate. A fraud scandal derailed his bid for re-election as Minnesota’s govern...

item.title: Facing Challenge From Lander, Dan Goldman Prepares to Defend His Seat
item.description: Mr. Goldman, a Democrat from New York City, faces a stiff primary battle that could turn on Gaza and how to fight President Trump.

item.title: George Conway, a Trump Foe, Changes Home and Party to Run for Congress
item.description: The former conservative has moved from the Washington suburbs to Manhattan and will run for an open House seat in a heavily Democratic district.
